languages.text: "Бог-Император, дай мне терпения вынести это ожидание и бездействие". {n}Арджента складывает руки аквилой и, кажется, погружается в тихую молитву.{/n}
"God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Бог-Император, дай мне терпения вынести это ожидание и бездействие". {n}Арджента складывает руки аквилой и, кажется, погружается в тихую молитву.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and seems to go into a quiet prayer.{/n}
"God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}
"God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure these dullards' obtuse ways... but their persistence in concealing the Rogue Trader borders on heresy!"
"God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}

"God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}

languages.text: “神皇在上，请赐予我耐心，让我忍受这无聊的等待。”{n}阿洁塔做了个双头鹰手势，不再出声，似乎在默默祈祷。{/n}
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “神皇在上，请赐予我耐心，让我忍受这无聊的等待。”{n}阿洁塔做了个双头鹰手势，不再出声，似乎在默默祈祷。{/n}

languages.text: «Dios Emperador, dame paciencia para soportar esta interminable espera». {n}Argenta traza el signo del Aquila y entona una plegaria silenciosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Dios Emperador, dame paciencia para soportar esta interminable espera». {n}Argenta traza el signo del Aquila y entona una plegaria silenciosa.{/n}

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator, bana bu boş bekleyişe dayanacak sabrı bahşet." {n}Argenta, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıp sessizce dua etmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tanrı İmparator, bana bu boş bekleyişe dayanacak sabrı bahşet." {n}Argenta, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıp sessizce dua etmeye başlıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「神帝陛下、この無為な待ち時間に耐える忍耐を私にお授けください」{n}アルジェンタはアクィラの印を結び、静かな祈りのようなものを捧げ始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下、この無為な待ち時間に耐える忍耐を私にお授けください」{n}アルジェンタはアクィラの印を結び、静かな祈りのようなものを捧げ始めた。{/n}

languages.text: « Empereur-Dieu, accordez-moi la patience d'endurer cette attente oisive. » {n}Argenta fait le signe de l'Aquila et entame une prière discrète.{/n}
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Empereur-Dieu, accordez-moi la patience d'endurer cette attente oisive. » {n}Argenta fait le signe de l'Aquila et entame une prière discrète.{/n}

languages.text: "Gottimperator, gewähre mir die Geduld, dieses sinnlose Warten zu ertragen." {n}Argenta macht das Zeichen des Adlers und stimmt ein leises Gebet an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "God-Emperor, grant me the patience to endure this idle wait." {n}Argenta makes the sign of the Aquila and slips into what looks like a quiet prayer.{/n}
